work.title: Software Engineer I-II
desc: Contributed to the Azure Security team to deliver security services and products to tailored cloud environments.
Design and implement automated deployment pipelines to address buildout dependencies and meet customer needs.
Developed tools to streamline onboarding of virtual machine certificates and networking in unique environments.
Manage distributed virtual machines in multiple regions, ensuring reliable security updates and patch deployments.
Provide support for customer-facing services, including on-call rotations to ensure high availability and reliability.

work.title: Software Engineer
desc: Headed programming projects for team that maintains, develops, and integrates virtual machines and hardware.
Developed GUI and backend for managing virtual machines and network/hardware (Python, C++).
Led a full software conversion of virtual machine manager from CentOS 6 to 7, including reworking of backend.

work.title: Software Development Intern
desc: Worked on a team to develop and test software and build backend services (Java, SQL).
Gained experience in team-oriented software development and business software development practices (Agile, Atlassian / Jira, Bitbucket).

work.title: ROTC Battalion Communications and Network Staff
desc: Acted as the Communication and Network head in the JMU Army ROTC Battalion.
Handled network troubleshooting and solved communication and technical problems.

school.title: BS Computer Science
school.desc: Led the ROTC Cyber Defense club. 2020 Collegiate Wind Conference engineering team.

school.title: High School
school.desc: Graduated with an advanced diploma. Participated in Computer Science program for 4 years.

hobbies: I am very interested in learning about all forms of software development and computer networking. Some of my personal projects have included personal servers, web apps, computer games, android apps, and also this website!
